title: Serpico_(1973)[XviD]

Title: Serpico

Released: 1973
Length: 02:10:03
Size: 1.33GB
Genre: Drama, Action, Suspense

Plot: Despite the pressures and coaxing from the other officers and higher ups on the New York police department Frank Serpico (Al Pacino) does not lend himself to being a paid off cop. He has the highest of high standards of integrity in the police force as a young undercover while veterans on the force pride themselves in their take of the action. In the light of being hated by everyone on the force exposing the magnitude of corruption is 
not an easy task which nearly gets Serpico killed.

Starring: Al Pacino, John Randolph, Barbara Eda-Young, Cornelia Sharpe, Jack Kehoe and others.
